item.title: A clear winner is emerging in the semiconductor equipment space, says Barclays
item.description: The bank upgraded the wafer fab equipment maker to overweight from equal weight.

item.title: From fraternities to women's soccer, this under-the-radar T-shirt brand is popping up everywhere
item.description: A loyal and growing base of consumers are driving demand for the half-century-old, Gildan-owned shirt brand Comfort Colors.

item.title: Top Wall Street analysts are upbeat on these 3 dividend-paying stocks
item.description: Here are three dividend-paying stocks, highlighted by Wall Street's top pros.

item.title: China wants to play the long game with the U.S. What that means for Chinese stocks
item.description: As U.S.-China tensions escalate and overall market volatility rises, investment strategists are watching how Beijing will likely double down on tech.

item.title: Earnings playbook: Netflix and Tesla among the big companies slated to report
item.description: The third-quarter earnings season got off to a strong start. Investors will look to this week's companies to keep the momentum going.
